title: Binance.US Not Being Totally Forthcoming, SEC Complains in New Filing
description: The SEC and Binance.US filed a joint status report detailing ongoing discovery efforts on Tuesday.

title: LUNA Pumps 77% as Do Kwon Evades Extradition—But the Gains Are Fading
description: The rebooted LUNA and LUNA Classic (LUNC) both skyrocketed on Tuesday on news of Terra founder Do Kwon's latest legal developments.

title: Osprey ready to sunset its OTC Bitcoin trust by sale, merger or liquidation
description:
Once the tiny competitor to Grayscale’s GBTC, Osprey is trading at a discount and ready to take extreme measures for recovery.

Osprey Bitcoin Trust announced on March 5 that it is in talks on its sale or merger. If the talks are fruitless, the trust will deregister and be liquidated in 180 days.

Osprey said it was aware that fractional units of the BTC trust were trading at a discount to the value of Bitcoin (BTC). It was considering options for “alternatives to maximize unitholder value.” The announcement was enough to give the unit price a significant boost, however. After closing at $15.98 on March 4, the unit reached $20.68 on March 5 before declining to $19.17 at the time of writing.

Osprey founder and CEO Greg King shared the company’s efforts to achieve positive financial results on X (formerly Twitter). The company filed Form 8-K with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) on Jan. 11 to inform the agency of its intention to hold a tender for the purchase for cash of 20% of its units at the net asset value, minus taxes and fees. King wrote:

Read more

title: Deaton now accepting crypto donations in campaign against Elizabeth Warren
description:
Senate candidate John Deaton announced he will begin accepting crypto donations to support his campaign against Elizabeth Warren. Deaton, whose resume spans from the US Marines to crypto law, unveiled his campaign with a video on Feb. 20 that showcased his journey from a challenging childhood in Detroit to his service as a judge advocate […]

The post Deaton now accepting crypto donations in campaign against Elizabeth Warren appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Make $500 a day from home with free cloud mining
description: In 2024, with the advent of the new year, more and more people are seeking opportunities to earn passive income from home, and cloud mining is becoming a very popular choice. Even if you are a novice, you can easily make money through cloud mining.

title: How is Tether triggering stablecoin concerns this time?
description: Tether has recently hit a massive benchmark, amassing a $100 billion circulation, bringing attention to the rapid expansion of the most stablecoins globally. This achievement has sparked a blend of excitement and apprehension with concerns about the potential implications for broader market stability. title: Traditional investors prefer Bitcoin ETFs to gold
description: Investor sentiment in Bitcoin ETFs reflects a growing preference for the crypto over traditional gold despite both reaching unprecedented price levels.

title: Osprey Bitcoin Trust aims to merge, may be sold to existing Bitcoin ETF
description: Osprey Bitcoin Trust, a Delaware statutory trust, has acknowledged that its units are trading at a discount to Bitcoin's value.
